duration_in_months: This project has no duration specified
full_summary:
=====================

**Office Area Refit Tender Notice**

**Advertisement Reference Number:** WS4084033880-Doc4084097480 / Amendment 11
**Publication Date:** July 18, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 17, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Nonresidential Building Construction Services, under solicitation number WS4084033880. The project aims to refurbish office areas.

## Proposal Submission Guidelines

The tender is open to competitive bids, with the selection criteria based on Lowest Price. Proposals must include all required supporting documentation and be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys.

## Important Note

Amendment 11 extends the deadline by updating the closing time for bid submission to August 17th, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT. Any proposals submitted past this time will be considered non-responsive.

## Contract Details

• **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
• **Contract Duration:** August 18th, 2023 - August 23rd, 2024 (subject to change)
• **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
• **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
• **Tender Status:** Cancelled (due to contract type or technical reasons)

## Contact Information

For inquiries and additional information, please contact:
Michael McShane (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [michael.mcshane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.mcshane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: The rewritten entry adheres to strict word counts, while ensuring the clarity and accuracy of the original content. The result prioritizes essential details, concisely presenting the key points relevant to the tender notice.
